lead_paragraph: Justin Morneau had a career-high five hits, and Jason Bartlett and Torii Hunter each homered last night for the Minnesota Twins in a 7-3 victory over the Red Sox in Boston.
snippet: Justin Morneau had a career-high five hits, and Jason Bartlett and Torii Hunter each homered last night for the Minnesota Twins in a 7-3 victory over the Red Sox in Boston.
